Name: Defend Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Flying-type moves from damaging Bug-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Bug-type Pokémon.  You can get a Defend Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Green Silk, a Wonder Dust, and a Guard Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
